entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:27 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then clearing. Local amount 4 cm over higher terrain. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
